name: Office Racer
description:
Gameplay

Office racer is new type of racing game where you race around different levels. You race like a furious head to find the finish lines to beat the game. Its a fun racing game and there is a cool backround music bringing the atmosphere. The car controls from most realistic car driving simulators. You drive with a RC formula car fast as you can win the game. You can meet the old man named Winston in the game. There is a 5 different levels to race. You can find secrets finish lines on the levels. RACE FAST AS YOU CAN!

Features

  • RC CAR
  • AMAZING CAR CONTROLS
  • DRIFTING
  • REAL CAR SOUNDS

Controls

  • W=GAS
  • S=BRAKE
  • A=LEFT
  • D=RIGHT
  • SPACE=HANDBREAK
  • C=CHANGE CAMERA ANGLE
  • R=RESTART THE LEVEL
